title: Remote Education Preparedness and Lifelong Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Nursing Practicum Students

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and practical training experience
context.additional_context: A program conducted in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, where learners engage in studies while balancing work responsibilities as professionals.

learning_goals: Participants acquire proficiency in using remote education platforms at over 90% within three months.
Participants recognize the necessity of lifelong learning at 4.5 or higher on a 5-point scale evaluation.
Participants can propose three or more specific strategies for efficient time management and self-directed learning in remote education.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
